languages.text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Attacks from this servitor apply bleeding (4) if the target fails a Toughness resistance test with a −20 penalty.

Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

languages.text: このサーヴィターの攻撃は、対象が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抵抗判定{/g}に−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受けて失格した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}(4)が適用される。
languages.original_text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: このサーヴィターの攻撃は、対象が耐久力抵抗テストに−20のペナルティを受けて失格した場合、出血(4)が適用される。

languages.text: 被命中的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则会承受{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）效果。
languages.original_text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 被命中的目标需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-20减值。若目标未能通过检定，则会承受流血（4）效果。

languages.text: Los ataques de este servidor infligen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4) si el objetivo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20.
languages.original_text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de este servidor infligen hemorragia (4) si el objetivo falla una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −20.

languages.text: Angriffe dieses Servitors führen zu {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4), wenn das Ziel eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 nicht besteht.
languages.original_text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Angriffe dieses Servitors führen zu Blutung (4), wenn das Ziel eine Zähigkeit-Widerstandsprobe mit einem Abzug von -20 nicht besteht.

languages.text: Les attaques de ce servitor appliquent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4) si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20.
languages.original_text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques de ce servitor appliquent l'effet Saignement (4) si la cible échoue à un test lié à la Résistance avec une pénalité de -20.

languages.text: Атаки этого сервитора накладывают {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} (4), если цель проваливает {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20.
languages.original_text: Attacks from this servitor apply {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Атаки этого сервитора накладывают кровотечение (4), если цель проваливает проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −20.
Атаки этого сервитора накладывают кровотечение (4), если цель проваливает проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −20.
